languages.text: И еще молвил: "Ежели желаешь дати сим сирым землю — дай, ибо богат Фолстоун пустынной землей. Но не вменяй нам в долг заботитися о них, поелику то — не наша стезя. Заботься о них и заботься о нас, а мы признаем тебя планетарным владыкой своим".

Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."
languages.original_text: И еще молвил: "Ежели желаешь дати сим сирым землю — дай, ибо богат Фолстоун пустынной землей. Но не вменяй нам в долг заботитися о них, поелику то — не наша стезя. Заботься о них и заботься о нас, а мы признаем тебя планетарным владыкой своим".

traits.locale_text: Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

languages.text: Y dijo: «Si vuestro deseo es otorgar tierras a estos desdichados, otorgadla, pues si algo abunda en Rocainmunda es la tierra árida. Pero no nos encomendéis cuidar de ellos, ya que no es nuestro camino. Si cuidáis de ellos y de nosotros, os reconoceremos como soberan{mf|o|a} de nuestro planeta».
languages.original_text: Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

traits.locale_text: Y dijo: «Si vuestro deseo es otorgar tierras a estos desdichados, otorgadla, pues si algo abunda en Rocainmunda es la tierra árida. Pero no nos encomendéis cuidar de ellos, ya que no es nuestro camino. Si cuidáis de ellos y de nosotros, os reconoceremos como soberan{mf|o|a} de nuestro planeta».

languages.text: 之后，他又说道：“如果你打算把这片土地赐予这些可怜人，那就赐予他们吧，荒寂岩地有大片大片干旱的土地。但请不要让我们承担照顾他们的责任，因为这并不是我们的道途。赐予他们恩典，也赐予我们恩典，只要这样，我们就承认你是这颗行星的统治者。”
languages.original_text: Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

traits.locale_text: 之后，他又说道：“如果你打算把这片土地赐予这些可怜人，那就赐予他们吧，荒寂岩地有大片大片干旱的土地。但请不要让我们承担照顾他们的责任，因为这并不是我们的道途。赐予他们恩典，也赐予我们恩典，只要这样，我们就承认你是这颗行星的统治者。”

languages.text: そして彼は言った。「この惨めな者達に土地を与えたくば、そうするがいい。ファウルストーンには不毛の土地が腐るほどある。だが、その者達の面倒を見ることを、我らの責務としてはならない。それは我らの道ではない。その者達に与え、そして我々に与えることで、我々は汝の我らの惑星の領主として認めよう」
languages.original_text: Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

traits.locale_text: そして彼は言った。「この惨めな者達に土地を与えたくば、そうするがいい。ファウルストーンには不毛の土地が腐るほどある。だが、その者達の面倒を見ることを、我らの責務としてはならない。それは我らの道ではない。その者達に与え、そして我々に与えることで、我々は汝の我らの惑星の領主として認めよう」

languages.text: Dann sprach er: "Sollte es Euer Wunsch sein, diesen Personen Land zu übertragen, so tut dies, denn Foulstone hat trockenes Land im Übermaß. Aber verpflichtet uns nicht, für sie zu sorgen, denn das ist nicht unser Pfad. Sorgt für sie und sorgt für uns, und wir werden Euch als {mf|Souverän|Souveränin} des Planeten anerkennen."
languages.original_text: Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

traits.locale_text: Dann sprach er: "Sollte es Euer Wunsch sein, diesen Personen Land zu übertragen, so tut dies, denn Foulstone hat trockenes Land im Übermaß. Aber verpflichtet uns nicht, für sie zu sorgen, denn das ist nicht unser Pfad. Sorgt für sie und sorgt für uns, und wir werden Euch als {mf|Souverän|Souveränin} des Planeten anerkennen."

languages.text: Et de poursuivre : « Si votre souhait est de conférer des terres à ces malheureux, qu'il en soit ainsi, car Rochepeste ne manque pas d'étendues arides. Mais ne nous demandez pas de nous occuper d'eux, car telle n'est pas notre vocation. Subvenez à leurs besoins, ainsi qu'aux nôtres, et nous reconnaîtrons votre règne sur cette planète. »
languages.original_text: Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

traits.locale_text: Et de poursuivre : « Si votre souhait est de conférer des terres à ces malheureux, qu'il en soit ainsi, car Rochepeste ne manque pas d'étendues arides. Mais ne nous demandez pas de nous occuper d'eux, car telle n'est pas notre vocation. Subvenez à leurs besoins, ainsi qu'aux nôtres, et nous reconnaîtrons votre règne sur cette planète. »

languages.text: Ardından dedi ki: "Bu biçarelere toprak bahşetmek istiyorsanız bahşedin, Menfurtaş'ta çorak toprak boldur. Ancak bize onlarla ilgilenme görevi vermeyin, bizim yolumuz bu değil. Hem onlarla hem bizimle ilgilenin, biz de sizi gezegenin hükümdarı olarak kabul edelim."
languages.original_text: Then quoth he, "If it be thy wish to confer land upon these wretches, confer it, for Foulstone has arid land in abundance. But make it not our duty to care for them, for that is not our path. Provide for them and provide for us, and we shall acknowledge thee as our planetary sovereign."

traits.locale_text: Ardından dedi ki: "Bu biçarelere toprak bahşetmek istiyorsanız bahşedin, Menfurtaş'ta çorak toprak boldur. Ancak bize onlarla ilgilenme görevi vermeyin, bizim yolumuz bu değil. Hem onlarla hem bizimle ilgilenin, biz de sizi gezegenin hükümdarı olarak kabul edelim."
